docs.title: Richard Hubbard Advent of Code 2021 solutions
docs.text:
Browser base runner for AOC 2021, using a TypeScript React app bootstrapped with Create React App.

I moved on to NextJS in 2022. Who knows what 2023 will bring.

docs.title: Example abbreviations
docs.text: The HTML specification is maintained by the W3C.

docs.title: Definition
docs.text: Apple Pomaceous fruit of plants of the genus Malus in the family Rosaceae. Orange The fruit of an evergreen tree of the genus Citrus.
